DOC.brief_summary: The purpose retrospective study evaluate incidence SSI colorectal surgery general anesthesia different general anesthetic technique : inhalation versus total intravenous anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: TIVA , Inhalation Anesthesia , Surgical Site Infection
DOC.criteria: Adult patient underwent elective colorectal surgery general anesthesia January 2011 December 2013 .
